chapters.title: Chapter 39: Encounters in Samara
chapters.info: Queen Ellizelle, p. 623 (441)—Queen of Ghealdan after after Johanin died. She tried to put down Masema's gatherings but failed. She died by drinking poison afterward. She was succeeded by Teresia. See also Johanin; Kigarin, Alliandre Maritha; Teresia.
